The rocket cannons on its shell fire jets of water capable of punching holes through thick steel.
While it is young, it uses the nutrients that are stored in the seed on its back in order to grow.
Its wings can carry this PokÃ©mon close to an altitude of 4,600 feet. It blows out fire at very high temperatures.
origin.cobblemorigins.species/charmander: From the time it is born, a flame burns at the tip of its tail. Its life would end if the flame were to go out.
origin.cobblemorigins.species/charmeleon: If it becomes agitated during battle, it spouts intense flames, incinerating its surroundings.
origin.cobblemorigins.species/ivysaur.de: Exposure to sunlight adds to its strength. Sunlight also makes the bud on its back grow larger.
origin.cobblemorigins.species/squirtle.d: When it feels threatened, it draws its limbs inside its shell and sprays water from its mouth.
origin.cobblemorigins.species/venusaur.d: A bewitching aroma wafts from its flower. The fragrance becalms those engaged in a battle.
It cleverly controls its furry ears and tail to maintain its balance while swimming.
